name: Bright Thoughts
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Use your mouse to click on various objects at the library and grocery store, and use the arrows to progress through the story. Have fun exploring (and clicking!) all the objects in each location.

Once you go to sleep, you can use WASD and space bar to continue your adventure!

Bright Thoughts consists of two distinct yet interacting games. The first represents the conscious part of the brain as the player makes their way through a hectic day.  This portion of the game functions as a choice-based narrative.   As the player’s to-do list is completed, their interactions with objects, and memories have ramifications in the second part of the game which represents the unconscious, sleeping brain. 

This game was created in 48 hours for the IGA Jelly Jam (theme: Sun up, Sun down)
